statement.p: A certain bread recipe asks you to combine flour and yeast with 3 cups of warm 115 째F water. If the water is hotter or colder than that, then the bread won't rise.
All you have available are water from your instant hot water dispenser that is 200 째F and cold tap water that is 60 째F.
How much water from your instant hot water dispenser and cold tap water should you mix together to get 3 cups of 115 째F water?
cups of water from your instant hot water dispenser.

p.em: Round your answers to 2 decimal places.
